title: barely.fi – Custom E-commerce Website
description: Developed and deployed a fully functional e-commerce website for a local skate gear brand (barely.fi). Managed the entire development lifecycle—from planning and UI/UX design to backend logic, frontend implementation, and live deployment. The platform includes features like product listings, dynamic filtering, shopping cart functionality, and responsive design optimized for both desktop and mobile. Worked directly with the client to tailor the site’s functionality to their business needs and ensure a smooth launch experience.
